com.datamotion

Class DMWeb

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datamotion.DMWeb

  • public class DMWeb
extends Object
    Main Class containing methods for all DataMotion SecureMail API funtions
    Author:
    Thomas Tyler Bissell

    • Method Detail

      • logon

        public static void logon(String user,
                         String pass)
                  throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException
        Retrieves a session key if valid credentials are used as arguments. SessionKey is stored as a member of the base DMWeb class. A valid session key is required for all other SecureMail API functions.
        Parameters:
        user - string login username
        pass - string login password
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException - Exception specific to JSON to Object mapping errors

      • getAccountDetails

        public static Details getAccountDetails()
                                 throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException
        Retrieves account details in a standard format
        Returns:
        Details object mapped from JSON in server response
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException - Exception specific to JSON to Object mapping errors

      • changePassword

        public static void changePassword(String oldPass,
                                  String newPass)
        Changes login password, requires valid current password and valid old password to be successful
        Parameters:
        oldPass - string old password
        newPass - string new password

      • logout

        public static void logout()
        Invalidates the SessionKey in use by DMWeb

        public static void deleteFolder(int folderID)
        Deletes a custom folder, given that folder's ID. Non-custom folders cannot be deleted
        Parameters:
        folderID - int folder ID

      • getUnreadMessages

        public static MessageSummariesResponse getUnreadMessages(boolean after,
                                                         int lastMessageId)
                                                  throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException
        Retrieves message summaries of all unread messages in a user's inbox
        Parameters:
        after - boolean to retrieve only messages after a specified ID
        lastMessageId - int specified ID, used if after is true
        Returns:
        MessageSummariesResponse object, mapped from JSON in server response
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException - Exception specific to JSON to Object mapping errors
